QuestData.Title: A Different Source
QuestData.Description: I need you to fetch me something.$b$bI think I might be on the verge of a breakthrough of a new source of magic, but I require tools. $b$bI can no longer access my workshop, but I have seen the smaller demons below using tools. Bring me one of their tools and I can save our people.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Find a Fel Deconstructor for Kyrtos.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Fel Deconstructor for Kyrtos.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find anything? I did not exactly get a chance to pack my things before I was exiled.
QuestData.RewardText: This was all you could find? I suppose it will have to do, although it is a primitive instrument.
